Package ch.pschatzmann.edgar.reporting.company

Automatic generation of SQL request to provide the parameters for one company
Author:
pschatzmann
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ICompanyInfo
    Provides the reported parameter values for a company by date.
    ICompanyInfoResult
    Result which supports different formats
    IRowFilter
    Dynamic Filter to select the valid filing rows
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CompanyEdgarValuesBase
    Provides the reported parameter values for a company by date.
    CompanyEdgarValuesDB
    Provides the reported parameter values for a company by date from the sql database.
    CompanyEdgarValuesEdgar
    Provides the reported parameter values for a company directly from EDGAR.
    CompanyEdgarValuesFile
    Provides the reported parameter values for a company by date from the xbrl zip files.
    CompanyEdgarValuesRest
    Provides the reported parameter values for a company by date from the REST API.
    CompanySearch
    Provides the company information for all or selected companies
    CompanySelection
    Selection Criteria for the selection of a company
    FilterQuarterly
    Returns all 10-Q entries for 3 months (P and L) or 0 months (Balance Sheet values)
    FilterQuarterlyCumulated
    Returns all 10-Q and 10-K entries for 3,6,9 and 12 months or 0 months
    FilterYearly
    Returns all 10-K entries for 12 months or 0 months.
    NoFilter
    Returns all 10-K entries for 12 months or 0 months
    PeriodsDetermination
    For an ITable we evaluate the reporting dates in order to identify the valid yearly K-10 dates, The quarterly entries or the cumulated quarterly entries.
